ygData.subject: Re: Languages
ygData.msgSnippet: You need certain levels to train it.  You don t need a level to learn it from friends.  I tested out creating a newbie and spamming him with Old Erudite.  Then
ygData.messageBody:
You need certain levels to train it. You don't need a level to learn it
from friends. I tested out creating a newbie and spamming him with Old
Erudite. Then we had the newbie go to the trainer at level 4 to pump 20
points into Old Erudite. The trainer wouldn't teach it even though he had
it in his skills list.

Zolthar

At 03:04 AM 5/11/99 -0700, you wrote:
>From: "Frank Varbel" <fvarbel1@...>
>
>i think you can train in any language at your guild once you have been
>exposed to it. for example i bet you spent some time in blackburrow before
>you went and checked. and now you can train in gnoll.
